reviews.review: Is a nice game ! Please fix bug on caldwim farm map!!
Gameplay good but sv so bad !

Great fun game with friends. Game has a wild variety of player characters with cosmetics, as well as a equally large variety of monsters. Getting into the game past a learning curve was very long and tedious but well worth it. 

I got the game just before the Resident Evil Chapter came out and am writing this a few hours before the launch of the Hellraiser chapter. 

Game has a plethora of bugs and latancy issues but unless you're 100% invested in a try hard attitude it's not a problem.  There also is a notable amount of samey games with the same Killers. While some killers such as Legion, Blight, Ghostface and (in earlier ranks mostly) the automatically unlocked are seen frequently you rarely ever see some killers. Nights spent with my friends can end up being annoying when we only see Wraiths and Legions.

The biggest downside to the game is not exactly in the game itself but the frequency of toxic players but most online games have that problem anyway. 

Otherwise really fun game, excited for whats to come next.

R.I.P Stranger Things.
El unico lugar donde los killer le tienen miedo a los survivor, dont worry pequeÃ±o timmy, si te gustan las peliculas de asesinos y monstruos, este es tu juego definitivamente.

My favorite thing about this game is the versatility. If I want to play with friends and be social I can play survivor and have a ton of fun, if I want to play by myself or my friends aren't online then I can play killer and still have just as much fun playing solo. Only complaint is there is a lot of DLC and honestly the perks and different abilities are cool but after a while it all starts feeling basically the same. I feel like they could do a better job instilling some variety into the game like having to do more than just repair generators or have games with multiple killers or w/e. However, if you like doing the same thing over and over then it's pretty fun.

I am horrible at this game!!...

...but I continue to play and fun is had by all.

Eventually I will good.  Naw, who am I kidding, I will stay horrible and this game will still stay fun.

I enjoy being killed straight away by the spirit. I also enjoy chasing survivors around a pallet for 20 minutes
Run away from the game while you still can

Where to begin...have you ever wondered what it is like to carry your team and after powering multiple generators, safely unhooking multiple people, and running the killer for over 8 minutes just to de-rank? This is the ideal experience. If you would prefer to hide the whole game, refuse to assist your team with anything and ratting it out until you are the last one alive, take the hatch, and move on up through the ranks, this game covers that too.

Oh and the killers. Why not reward killers for face camping? Seems like the most fun thing you could possibly do! Thats right, there are 2 different modes you can be a complete, steaming pile of shit and get rewarded for it! 

So buckle up for the worst experience you can imagine.
Its fun, you can be the killer or survivor. There are tons of people to choose from to play as and they all have different perks. There are daily challenges and regular challenges for blood points.
This game is frustrating,scary,fun and it is my Fav game.

lets begin
step 1: buy dbd. (first mistake)
step 2: download dbd (2nd mistake)
step 3: launch dbd (3rd mistake)
step 4: find a killer or survivor to play
step 5: launch a game (4th mistake)
step 6: press alt+f4 because ur either gonna meet a facecamping tunneling peice of  killer or ur gonna meet a team of rank one survivors with flashlight since the matchmaking in this game sucks.
step 7: delete the game (first good decision)
step 8: send a refund request: (2nd good decision)

and that was all
Jogo divertido pra jogar com os amigos, nada mas que isso, sem historia game play repetitiva, chato de jogar sozinho. recomendo se tiver quatro amigos, se nÃ£o nem compra.
I love building a community around this game, I have made so many new friends and I love how the game can be fun and competitive at the same time!

I've had this game since a little while after graduating high school. I'm 24 now. The game's development has had it's ups and downs. It was a game that definitely required a lot of "grinding" in order to be a decent player for a while but now they've added a lot of different ways to earn your currency to get a-tier perks. I've enjoyed watching this game continue to develop. I would recommend this game.

I don't care for anything horror related at all. But this game is so fun with friends that I make an exception. Whether playing as killer or survivor, the game is an instant classic in the asymmetrical multiplayer genre.

Best game with lots of iconic horror killers and iconic survivors. If you ever love to smack survivors or you like to troll killers. Very recommendable game to mess with your friends too and scare them!
fun game with a smaller learning curve than most games. Great game if you have a gf and want her to play something with you

Despite there being aspects to this game that I believe are unbalanced and things that I believe the game needs to update, through all of my playing I have little complaints about the experiences I have. There is a great deal of strategy and a decent meta that is revolving all the time. The killers that are added are usually at least a decent addition, though survivors I feel like are a bit more stale (this coming from a survivor main). I definitely think that there needs to be some form of communication in the game. I find myself the most frustrated with decisions made by other players to help me that are genuinely terrible moves that I wish I could indicate to them to not do that. For example, If I'm on the hook and I see a killer is nearby and will certainly attack/down me or anyone else in my vicinity if I'm unhooked, I would like to make sure that a survivor who is coming to save me will stop heading my way since it is an unwise decision. Situations like those can make a game session crumble fast. My other complaint is certainly variety. I feel as though even without survivors using map offerings, it is easy to find myself playing Treatment Theater, Underground Complex, and Autohaven Wreckers a lot more than like any other map. What's worse is that as a survivor those maps are all very killer sided. While I don't mind the maps themselves and they provide a decent challenge on the survivor end, it is a little ridiculous when I get the same maps every session I play. Like I literally have had Ormond at least five times today. However, despite everything I really enjoy playing other survivors with worthwhile perks and trying out new methods for saving people. So this game is super fun, though there are some things that I would like to see be improved.

I love this game so much and play it all the time. Yes, it can be buggy but it is very fun if you have friends to play with. Its just your basic asymmetrical game but with a lot of twists. First there are perks that can help survivors and killers to win. Second, each killer has different powers that can heavily affect the game. Lastly, there are cool killers and survivors that are from other games such as Nemesis, Demogorgon, Micheal Myers, Freddy Kruger and much more! Overall, I think this game is amazing to play and really fun to play with friends. (So make sure you have those) It may be buggy at times but all games have bugs but the devs are kinda lazy. Well I hope you chose to get this game and I hope you have a wonderful time playing it!

This game is fun, both as a Killer or Survivor. There are a few things that can this game, two of which involve other players, and just a few match ruining bugs. I havent really dealt with any bugs yet, however in my 11 hours playing this game I have had Survivors DC after getting hooked once and Killers who tunnel or camp the hooked survivors. 

Long story short, when you have good matches with equal skill the games are really fun and challenging, otherwise it becomes brain dead easy or just boring.
